title: 12 things 'Now And Then' taught us about womanhood, 20 years later
text:
Samantha, Roberta, Chrissy and Teeny. To many women who grew up during the '90s, these four names immediately conjure up images of the above movie poster, first kisses and the nostalgia of childhood best friendship. When it comes to magnum opuses of friendship, men have 1986's "Stand by Me."
See the full story at Huffington Post
